Metadata.title: Mustafa Genç
Metadata.description: Explore my collection of GitHub projects, read my blog posts, and stay updated by subscribing to my newsletter for project and blog updates.

Home.title: Full-Stack Developer.
Home.description: I have been working in software development for over 20 years. I specialize in .NET and web technologies and have successfully contributed to various projects across different industries. Currently, I am working as a Senior Software Developer at ENKA İnşaat ve Sanayi A.Ş., where I am responsible for the development of EGEM.
Home.egem: EGEM is a comprehensive platform that digitizes the management of machinery and equipment parks in the construction sector. It aims to increase operational efficiency and occupational safety by gathering critical processes such as equipment tracking, maintenance planning, malfunction management, fuel consumption monitoring, cost analysis, and reporting under a single roof.
Home.enka: ENKA, established in 1957, is an international construction and industrial giant. It also operates in the fields of energy, real estate, and manufacturing. It has undertaken major projects in Turkey and worldwide.

Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.description:
I'm open to freelance projects and collaborations. If you have a project, want to share ideas, or just feel like chatting, let's connect!

Feel free to reach out to me at or through the contact form below.
